allGuideText.howTo1: If you wish to follow a linear progression through the guide we suggest starting with the first section, called ["Where Do I Stand?"](/guide/where-do-i-stand). Each section ends with suggestions to move you to the next stop.
allGuideText.howTo2: If you like to play by your own rules, you can click any point on the [map](/guide/map) to explore. At the end of each section, there are suggestions for the next stop on your tour, but you donâ€™t have to follow those directions.
